name: Fiesta Baked Cheese Dip
instructions: Beat cream cheese in bowl on medium speed until softened.
Reserve 1/4 c. shredded cheese for garnish.
Add remaining shredded cheese, chilies, 1/2 c. sour cream and ground red pepper to cream cheese; mix well.
Spoon into 10 inch pie plate or quiche dish.
Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or until lightly browned around edge.
Spread remaining 3/4 c. sour cream over baked cheese spread.
When I made this I added all the sour cream so I didnâ€™t spread it over the baked cheese.
